00001 #include "draglistwidget.h"

00003 DragListWidget::DragListWidget(QWidget *parent) : QListWidget (parent)
00004 {
00005     setAcceptDrops(true);
00006     //connect(this, SIGNAL(startDrag()),this, SLOT(startDrag()), Qt::QueuedConnection);
00007 }
00008 
00009 void DragListWidget::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event){
00010     if (itemAt(event->pos())){
00011        if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00012        startPos = event->pos();
00013        drag=FALSE;
00014        dragstarted=TRUE;
00015     } else {
00016        dragstarted=FALSE;
00017     }
00018 
00019     QListWidget::mousePressEvent(event);
00020 }
00021 
00022 void DragListWidget::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event){
00023     if (itemAt(event->pos()) && dragstarted){
00024        if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton){
00025            int distance = (event->pos() - startPos).manhattanLength();
00026            if (distance > QApplication::startDragDistance())
00027                if (currentItem() && !drag){
00028                 emit startDrag();
00029                 drag=TRUE;
00030                }
00031                return;
00032        }
00033     }
00034     QListWidget::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void DragListWidget::dragEnterEvent(QDragEnterEvent *event){
00038   if (event->mimeData()->hasFormat("text/uri-list"))
00039   {
00040     QList<QUrl> list = event->mimeData()->urls();
00041     for (int i=0; i < list.length(); i++){
00042       //Accept only .exe, .bat or .com files
00043       if (list.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".exe", Qt::CaseInsensitive) || list.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".bat", Qt::CaseInsensitive) || list.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".com", Qt::CaseInsensitive)){
00044         event->acceptProposedAction();
00045         break;
00046       }
00047     }
00048   }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void DragListWidget::dragMoveEvent(QDragMoveEvent *event){
00052       DragListWidget *source = qobject_cast<DragListWidget *>(event->source());
00053       if (source && source != this){
00054         event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00055         event->accept();
00056       }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void DragListWidget::dropEvent(QDropEvent *event){
00060       DragListWidget *source = qobject_cast<DragListWidget *>(event->source());
00061       if (source && source != this){
00062         event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00063         event->accept();
00064       }
00065 
00066       emit(startDrop(event->mimeData()->urls()));
00067 }
